search_results.snippet:
The Ghost of Tom Joad is the eleventh studio album, and the second acoustic 
album, by American recording artist Bruce Springsteen. The album was released 
on November 21, 1995, through Columbia Records. The album was recorded 
and mixed at Thrill Hill West, Springsteen's home ... The album won the 1997 
Grammy Award for Best Contemporary Folk Album.

"The Ghost of Tom Joad" is a folk rock song written by Bruce Springsteen. It is the 
title track to his eleventh studio album, released in 1995. The character Tom Joad
, from John Steinbeck's classic 1939 novel The Grapes of Wrath, is mentioned in 
the title ... where the album won the Grammy Award for Best Contemporary Folk 
Album.
